snippet: Alcoa, the first big American company to release earnings results, came in just above analysts’ low expectations.
abstract: Anxious investors send stocks modestly lower ahead of corporate earnings reports and amid more signs of instability in Europe.
lead_paragraph: Alcoa, the first big American company to release earnings results, came in just above analysts’ low expectations.

headline.seo: Stock Market Sinks as Earnings Reports Loom
headline.main: Market Droops as Investors Await Earnings Reports
headline.print_headline: Market Droops as Investors Await Earnings Reports
